response.summary: Mechanical Engineer specialist in piping materials. I have skills and experience in welding processes, non-destructive testing, management of ASME, API and AWS codes. Successful knowledge about piping materials and piping design for oil and gas,  petrochemical and chemical plants. Skillful work with different software packages for materials management as Smart Plant Materials, Autocad and Smart Plant 3D for piping design.
response.skills: AutoCAD Plant 3D, SPMAT, Smart Plant 3D, Welding, Supply Chain Management, Oil & Gas Industry, AutoCAD, Nondestructive Testing (NDT), Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), Process Piping Design, Engineering Drawings, Project Management, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Project

profile_positions.description: Elaboration and specification of piping classes, preparation of technical documentation for piping department, thickness and mechanical calculation for pipes, technical specification for valves and other special piping components. Elaboration of Material take offs and 3D interfaces with Smart Plant 3D, AVEVA 3D and AutoCAD Plant 3D for projects developed by Technip Energies Iberia.
profile_positions.title: Piping Materials Engineer

profile_positions.description: Administration of Ecopetrol piping materials data base (Smart Reference Data & Smart Plant Materials). Data base configuration,  piping classes and S3D catalogues mapping. Training and technical support on SRD& SPMAT for Ecopetrol users.
profile_positions.title: Senior Solutions Specialist

profile_positions.description: Piping Engineer in charge of piping materials specifications and catalogues for 3D interfaces.
profile_positions.title: Piping Engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for material management/administration and checking engineering deliverables for TechnipFMC's ENPPI Sub-Contractor, as materials take offs, construction line lists, P&IDs, material requisitions for all piping materials, including technical evaluation and purchasing requisitions through detailed and  construction phases of engineering for the following units: Crude and vacuum distillation, solvent and deasphalting, cooling water, Storage and Handling. Technical support for ENPPI personnel in SPMAT and material management.
profile_positions.title: Piping Materials Specialist - Materials Management

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for preparing Piping Class specifications according to relevant standards, norms, and  international codes. Thickness calculation for pipes, technical specification for valves, fittings, and other piping components. Elaboration of material take offs, material requisitions and offers, technical tabulation, considering project P&ID’s, mechanical line List and other project specifications for different engineering phases as FEED and EPC contracts developed by Tipiel S.A and TechnipFMC. Successful knowledge in Smart Plant Materials (SPMAT) modules as material requisitions, bulk material management, technical specification module and mechanical calculation and verification routines.
Checking and quality assurance of technical documentation issued by piping materials section.
Basic-intermediate knowledge in  piping design on Smart Plant 3D, modeling equipment and piping, preparing plot plans and drawings for design section.
profile_positions.title: Piping Materials Specialist

profile_positions.description: Responsible to assurance the quality and control on field in the construction of a new Brewery. Inspection of welding joints in pipelines in Stainless and carbon steel (1-20 inches diameter) materials by mean of nondestructive testing, like visual inspection and remote visual inspection. Developing and custody of field welder tests. Supervision of the correct installation for rotatory and static equipment as heat exchangers, pumps, storage and process vessels. Working out and digitization of pipeline isometrics as build, interpretation of P&ID and  engineering drawings.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Quality Control Engineer

profile_positions.description: Asistente docente en el curso de soldadura y ensayos no destructivos de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Supervisión e instrucción a estudiantes en los procesos de soldadura y corte, procedimientos de seguridad industrial, manejo de equipos de soldadura, galgas, equipo de metrología, equipo de ultrasonido, radiografía industrial y corrientes de Eddy.
profile_positions.title: Research And Teaching Assistant

company.name: VERINGER ENGINEERING
company.description:
Vèringer es una empresa de Ingeniería que presta Servicios de consultoría y otras actividades relacionadas como Plantas Industriales, Productos/Procesos, Cálculos Industriales,que desarrolla su actividad con Empresas y Administraciones Públicas en un ámbito nacional e internacional.

Veringer crea Personal por Administración a nivel internacional, ofreciendo un suministro integral de talento humano especializado, para abastecer todos los recursos humanos de contratos EPCM.

Nuestra división de Outsourcing, con mas de 20 años de experiencia,  se diferencia por la garantía de conocimiento técnico, que otorga la experiencia de nuestras empresas a los recursos profesionales que suministramos a sus proyectos. 

Servicios de Outsourcing destacamos:
-Reclutamiento y Selección.
-Administración de Personal.
-Suministro de Personal Temporal.

Especilidades:

Diseño:
Tuberías, Mecánicos (Tank / Caesar), Civil (STAD PRO, SAP), Eléctricos, Instrumentación y Control.

Ingeniería Especializada:
Ingenieros de Procesos, Calculistas , Especialistas en montajes, Especialistas en puesta en marcha, Civiles con especialidad en estructuras,Eléctricos con especialidad en Instrumentación y Control, Ingenieros en Medio ambiente, Planificación.

Operación:
Líderes en puesta en marcha (refino/ciclos combinados), Superintendentes de construcción,  y Supervisores (Tuberías, Mecánicos, Eléctricos, Civiles, Instrumentación /Control, Procesistas, Instrumentistas, Eléctricos, Mecánicos)
www.veringer.com
